data.title: :::::::>> HUGE List of Anime Series ||
data.meta_description: "HUGE list of Anime Series" thread is just a contribution from me for this forum before I'm going to be away for a long-long  time, So I hope this list...
data.text:
"HUGE list of Anime Series" thread is just a contribution from me for this forum before I'm going to be away for a long-long time, So I hope this list can be useful to all people at here!! XD

LIST FOR WINTER ANIME 2009!!!!!

at the bottom... ;D

- Make use of the CTRL+F function to find the specific anime.

- Help me update the list by posting any missing or new anime as the List still incomplete . ;D

- I'll try to update the list (if) I have time to spare.

- You can ask for the Anime links, but be sure to follow the general rules of this forum.

- Google the Anime series if you didn't know much about the anime or you can request for a review, maybe?Don't worry, I'm sure some of the people here will help you. ;D

*Sticky this thread?.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ANIME List : Sorted by Alphabet( A-Z )

*MOST OF THE UPCOMING ANIME WILL BE AIRED ON OCTOBER(Not yet Confirmed)*

Nyan Koi! Aired!

Junpei Kōsaka is a second-year high school student who despises cats and has an allergy to them. It just so happens that his high school crush is Kaede Mizuno, a girl who adores cats. One day, while walking home from school, Junpei kicks an empty can and unfortunately beans the local neko-jizō-sama (guardian deity of cats). He finds he can now understand what cats are saying, including his family's own ill-tempered cat, Nyamusasu. However, if he does not grant 100 wishes from cats, he will turn into a cat himself.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kampfer Aired!

Bishoujo battle & school love comedy. Senou Natsuru is a normal high school boy. One day he wakes up to find himself turned into a girl. A stuffed tiger "Harakiri Tora" gains a life and tells him to fight as a female psychic fighter "Kämpfer". Having no idea about what's going on, Natsuru is involved in the battles against other Kämpfers.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Asura Cryin' 2 Aired!

The second season of Asura Cryin'.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Seitokai no Ichizon Aired!

A TV anime adaptation of Sugizaki Ken's light novel series of the same name, the adaptation was announced on the cover note of the fourth volume.

The members of the student council of Hekiyou Gakuen are chosen by a popularity vote. As a result, all the members are cute girls except for Sugizaki Ken, who studied hard to enter the council. This novel is about the endless chattering of the members with full of parodies of "The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya", "Dragon Ball" etc.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

To Aru Kagaku no Railgun Aired!

Academy City. 2.3 million inhabitants. 80% of the students are active in the ‘Brain Development Program’ and out of those only 7 are Level 5s.

Meet the civilian protagonist Mikoto and her friend Kuroko, maintainers of peace and order in the University district. Kuroko is a member of 'Judgement'.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tatakau Shisho - The Book of Bantorra Aired!

In a world where dead people turn into books and are stored in the Bantorra Library where anyone who reads a book can learn their past. Bantorra Library is maintained by Armed Librarians who wield psychic powers and their enemy is a religious society known as Sindeki Kyoudan.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kobato Aired!

Kobato is sweet and perky girl, but also extremely naive about the world around her. She has a "mission", which is to fill a mysterious bottle of hers with the suffering from people's hearts so her wish to go a certain place that she desires to go can be granted. However, she must not fall in love with a particular boy she works with and whose heart she must heal.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kimi ni Todoke Aired!

This story is centered around a girl named Kuronuma Sawako who is nicknamed Sadako (ghost girl from "The Ring") by her classmates because of her scary face and demeanor. She greatly admires Kazehaya-kun from afar, he is "100% refreshing" and is able to draw in people with his personality. Unlike her facial expressions she yearns to make friends and live as a normal student. Gradually she starts affects those around her, including Kazehaya-kun...

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

11eyes Aired!

Satsuki Kakeru lost his sister by suicide and has been living a dull life ever since then. One day, he is transported into a bizarre world "Red Night" along with his friend Minase Yuka. In order to survive and escape from Red Night, he fights against Dark Spirits (Ralva) and Black Nights.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sasameki Koto(Whispered Words) Aired!

Murasame Sumika is popular in the high school for her excellence in the marks and sports. However, she has a secret: she is in love with her classmate Kazama Ushio. Ushio also has a liking to the love between girls, but she hasn't noticed Sumika's feeling and always been refused by other girls.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Darker Than Black: Ryūsei no Gemini(Comet of Gemini) Aired!

In the sequel, Hei and Yin are now on the run after betraying the Syndicate in the previous season. After leaving Japan, Hei encounters Suou Pavlichenko, a 13 year old Eurasian girl who becomes embroiled in the war and politics of the various factions and Contractors vying for power. Meanwhile, Hell's Gate remains standing in Tokyo, after Hei's efforts to stop the Saturn Ring anti-Gate particle weapon from activating. Although Contractors are safe from the danger of having their existences erased, this does not prevent new and old Contractors from abusing their powers. As Misaki Kirihara and her team in the Public Security Bureau deal with the increasing Contractor cases, she also has to keep the Syndicate at bay, who has major positions in the Japanese police and intelligence bureaus around the world. The storyline setting primarily takes place in both Japan and Russia.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fairy Tail

Lucy Heartfilia aims to join the world most notorius mage guild, "Fairy Tail'.During the daring rescue, Lucy encounters Natsu, a teenaged practitioner of the Dragon Slayer magic and a Fairy Tail member. Lucy is welcomed into the guild to start a life of quests and mages.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tamagotchi!

Each of the episode will have 15-minutes time, and self contained stories

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kiddy Girl-and

In Star Century 0379, Ascule and Que Feuilles are working in GTO. They are the secret agents of ES .... on probation.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Queen's Blade: Gyokuza no Tsugumono Aired!

The story follows the competition to decide the next queen, whereby the strongest warrior will rule and expand the country. The contestant need to be older than 12, can be any race, any intelligent and any country.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kaidan Restaurant

TV Asahi announced a new kids anime "Kaidan Restaurant (Thriller Restaurant)" based on a picture book. It will be aired from this October.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Jungle Tatei Leo(Jungle Emperor Leo)

In the 21st century,The UN entrusts Eternal Earth to create "Neo Jungle" an artificial environment for wildlife facing extension. In this ecosystem, a young white lion, Leo is born. He vows to be the jungle emperor and encounters a boy called Ken'ichi.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Battle Spirits : Shounen Gekiha Dan

The Japanese toy conglomerate Bandai has revealed that the second television anime series based on the Battle Spirits trading card game will premiere on September 13 under the name Battle Spirits: Shōnen Gekiha Dan. The Sunrise anime studio will continue to produce along with the Nagoya TV station and the Asatsu-DK (ADK) advertising agency. JAM Project (MazinKaiser, Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monster GX, Super Robot Wars) will perform the opening theme and Mitsuhiro Oikawa (Battle Spirits: Shōnen Toppa Bashin, Revolutionary Girl Utena: The Movie) will sing the ending theme. Like the first anime series, the new series will incorporate computer graphics to portray the battles from the card game."

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Stitch 2!

*Will be Updated.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

White Album 2nd Season

Toya Fuji, a collage student, is dating a rising idol singer named Yuki Morikawa. There are numerous challenges to the couple's relationship from other people at Fuji's collage, Morikawa's work, and elsewhere.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Winter Sonata(Fuuyuu no Sonata)

Airing 2009. Based on the Korean drama television series about the love between two childhood friends and the tragic events that happen. The drama was a huge hit in Japan.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Romance of Three Kingdoms(Sangoku Engi)

"Chinese-Japanese anime adaptation of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms novel classic"

"The same Three Kingdoms novel inspired countless Japanese manga, anime, and games of varying historical accuracy, including Sangokushi, Ikki Tousen, New Tale of Three Kingdoms, Yawaraka Sangokushi Tsukisase!! Ryofuko-chan, SD Gundam BB Warriors: Romance of the Three Kingdoms, KOEI's Dynasty Warriors game franchise, and BaseSon's moe-influenced Koihime†Musō."

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Trapeze

Irabu Ichiro is an eccentric psychiatrist. Patients, who visit him to have a counseling, are perplexed with his weird behavior

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

New Anime Series this Winter!!!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Haiyore! Nyaruko-san

According to the GA Bunko blog, a flash anime adaptation of Aisora Manta’s light novel comedy series,「Haiyore! Nyaruko-san」, has been green-lit. The story revolves around a normal high school boy, (Yasaka Mahiro), who one night gets chased by aliens but is later saved by a mysterious silver-haired girl, (Nyarlathotep of Cthulhu Myth; a.k.a. Nyaruko). DLE Inc. will be the production studio behind the project.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Boku, Otaryman

The official blog to Yoshitani’s comedy manga series 「Boku, Otaryman」 will be receiving an OVA sometime in January 2010. It will star Kugimiya Rie and Miyano Mamoru.

Yoshitani’s comic-book series is called “Otaryman.” The title joins “salaryman,” the internationally known word for a loyal, hardworking company employee, with “otaku,” a word often used to describe a socially inept young man obsessed with comics, computers or anime.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gundam 00

The final episode of 「Mobile Suit Gundam 00 Second Season」 has revealed news of a film adaptation — slated to premiere 2010.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya

On the final episode of the 2009 airing of 「The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya (TV)」, an announcement came regarding a Spring 2010 theatrical release for the highly anticipated 「[urlhttp://www.haruhi.tv/]The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya[/url]」 story arc.

The Disappearance of Suzumiya Haruhi Video

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hetalia Axis Powers

According to Gentosha-Comics.net, a 「Hetalia Axis Powers」 film is scheduled for release sometime in 2010. Details are expected to be found in the November issue of Monthly Comic Birz magazine — on sale 09/30.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ladies versus Butlers!

A link to an official 「Ladies versus Butlers! / れでぃ×ばと！」 website, which is currently under construction, was posted on several 2ch threads earlier today. A light novel receiving an official website very much indicates that a new anime project will be formally announced soon…

「Ladies versus Butlers! / れでぃ×ばと！」 is originally a shounen light novel series from author Kouzuki Tsukasa — with illustrations by Munyuu. A manga adaptation is also available from the pages of Dengeki Moeoh.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ichiban Ushiro no Daimao

The wraparound jacket band found on the 7th volume of the novel has revealed that an anime adaptation of Mizuki Shoutarou’s fantasy shounen series,「Ichiban Ushiro no Daimao」, has been green-lit for production. Official website — not yet open.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Black★Rock Shooter

It was recently announced that Yamamoto Yutaka will be the supervisor for an anime of Huke’s 「Black★Rock Shooter」. The project is slated to air Spring 2010. An official website has also opened. *Special thanks to Sommion for the story.

A “Pilot Edition” have already been released on September 30th on Blu-ray and DVD.

(*Side-note: The character in B★RS is not Hatsune Miku.)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ōkamikakushi

Another announcement made at the TBS Anime Festa 2009 event was the TV anime adaptation of KONAMI’s mystery PSP game, 「Ōkamikakushi」. This was originally a collaboration project between Higurashi creator Ryukishi07 (director) and Rozen Maiden author Peach-Pit (character designer). The game was released August 20th, 2009. More details later.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kaichou wa Maid-sama!

According to the October issue of Monthly LaLa, Fujiwara Hiro’s shoujo manga series 「Kaichou wa Maid-sama!」 will be receiving an anime adaptation in the near future.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gundam Unicorn

It was confirmed today at Gundam Big Expo that 「Gundam Unicorn」 will be a six-episode OVA series — each with a running time of 50 minutes. The new project is slated for release Spring 2010.

According to an interview with author Harutoshi Fukui, episode one will be based off the first 2 volumes of the novel.

機動戦士ガンダムUC PV at GUNDAM BIG EXPO Video

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Arakawa Under the Bridge

According to the Young GanGan Fes. Anime no Okage SUMMER 2009 official pamphlet, an anime of Nakamura Hikaru’s comedy manga series「Arakawa Under the Bridge / 荒川アンダーザブリッジ」 has been green-lit.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WORKING!!

According to the Young GanGan Fes. Anime no Okage SUMMER 2009 official pamphlet, Takatsu Karino’s 4-panel manga 「WORKING!!」 will be receiving a TV anime adaptation. The story revolves around a young man named Takahashi who gets a job at a family restaurant.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fate/stay night Unlimited Blade Works

According to the September issue of Newtype magazine, a 「Fate/stay night Unlimited Blade Works」 film has been confirmed and will premiere January 23rd, 2010. It will have a running time of 90-minutes.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Uragiri wa Boku no Namae wo Shitteiru

According to the notice below, an anime of Odagiri Hotaru’s fantasy adventure series, 「Uragiri wa Boku no Namae wo Shitteiru (Betrayal Knows My Name)」, has been green-lit for production.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Deadman Wonderland

According to the notice below, Kataoka Jinsei (author) and Kondou Kazuma’s (illustrator) action drama series, 「Deadman Wonderland」, will be receiving an anime adaptation.

[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Halo Legends

According to the Los Angeles Times, Microsoft will give new life to their Halo franchise by introducing a 7-episode anime series entitled, 「Halo Legends」. Five of the biggest production studios will be behind the project: BONES, Production I.G, Studio 4℃, Toei Animation, and Casio Entertainment. A trailer is expected to be shown at this year’s Comic-Con event in San Diego, California, USA (July 23rd-26th.)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Third Season of “Shakugan no Shana”

Producer Nakayama Nobuhiro has revealed that the third season of Shakugan no Shana will follow the 「Shakugan no Shana S」 OVA series. The purpose behind the OVA project is to detail further into character backgrounds and relationships before moving on to the third season. The statement can be found in the August issue of Animedia magazine.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Break Blade

The official website to Yoshinaga Yunosuke’s manga 「Break Blade / ブレイク ブレイド」 has announced an anime adaptation for the series. No other details have been made as of yet.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dance in the Vampire Bund

The August issue of Comic Flapper magazine has revealed news of an anime adaptation for Tamaki Nozomu’s supernatural romance manga series 「Dance in the Vampire Bund」. No word yet on a premiere date.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dhurarara!!

According to the wraparound jacket band found below, Narita Ryohgo’s light novel series 「Dhurarara!!」 will be receiving a TV anime adaptation. The official website will be open at a later date

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kanokon R

According to the August issue of Megami magazine, a new 「Kanokon / かのこん」 animated project is in the works. It is tentatively titled, Kanokon R. Much of the staff and cast will remain the same from the first TV series. No word yet on whether this new one will be a TV or OVA series.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hanamaru Kindergarten

According to Square Enix’s Young GanGan magazine (issue #12), an anime adaptation of Yuto’s slice-of-life comedy series 「Hanamaru Youchien (Hanamaru Kindergarten)」 has been announced

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Valkyrie Complex

According to Moonphase Diary, an announcement was made at a recent event regarding the anime adaptation of Circus’ upcoming PC eroge title 「Valkyrie Complex」. The game, which is a mix of role-playing and strategic elements, was produced to commemorate Circus’ 10th anniversary — scheduled for release May 29th.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Baka to Test to Shokanju

According to Moonphase Diary, an anime and comic adaptation for the light novel 「Baka to Test to Shokanju」– written by Kenji Inoue and illustrated by the great Yui Haga (NSFW) — has been green-lit for production. A formal announcement will be made for both the anime and comic versions of the series in the June issue of Shounen Ace magazine — on sale April 25th.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Omamori Himari

According to an “Age Comic Information” flyer, Matra Milan’s comedy manga series 「Omamori Himari」 will be receiving a TV anime adaptation. A wraparound jacket band found on the just-released 5th volume of the manga also confirms the news. More info is expected to be announced in the next issue of Monthly Dragon Age magazine.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Seikon no Qwaser

According to the June issue of Champion RED magazine, Yoshino Hiroyuki’s supernatural manga adventure series, 「Seikon no Qwaser / 聖痕のクェイサー」, will be receiving a TV anime adaptation.
